mapper.sql: mchId, thirdKindId, majorId, newThirdKindId, newMajorId, humanId, salarystandardId, salarySum, newsalarystandardId, newSalarySum, changeReason, checkReason, checkStatus, register, checker, registTime, checkTime
mapper.insert: insert into majorchange (mchId, thirdKindId, majorId, newThirdKindId, newMajorId, humanId, salarystandardId, salarySum, newsalarystandardId, newSalarySum, changeReason, checkReason, checkStatus, register, checker, registTime, checkTime) values (#{mchid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{thirdkindid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{majorid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{newthirdkindid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{newmajorid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{humanid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salarystandardid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salarysum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{newsalarystandardid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{newsalarysum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{changereason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkreason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{register,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registtime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{checktime,jdbcType=DATE})

mapper.update:
update majorchange
thirdKindId = #{thirdkindid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
majorId = #{majorid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
newThirdKindId = #{newthirdkindid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
newMajorId = #{newmajorid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
humanId = #{humanid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
salarystandardId = #{salarystandardid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
salarySum = #{salarysum,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
newsalarystandardId = #{newsalarystandardid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
newSalarySum = #{newsalarysum,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
changeReason = #{changereason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
checkReason = #{checkreason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
checkStatus = #{checkstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
register = #{register,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
checker = #{checker,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
registTime = #{registtime,jdbcType=DATE},
checkTime = #{checktime,jdbcType=DATE},
where mchId = #{mchid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update majorchange set thirdKindId = #{thirdkindid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, majorId = #{majorid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, newThirdKindId = #{newthirdkindid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, newMajorId = #{newmajorid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, humanId = #{humanid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, salarystandardId = #{salarystandardid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, salarySum = #{salarysum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, newsalarystandardId = #{newsalarystandardid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, newSalarySum = #{newsalarysum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, changeReason = #{changereason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, checkReason = #{checkreason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, checkStatus = #{checkstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, register = #{register,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, checker = #{checker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, registTime = #{registtime,jdbcType=DATE}, checkTime = #{checktime,jdbcType=DATE} where mchId = #{mchid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select mc.mchId,yiji.firstKindName,erji.secondKindName,sanji.thirdKindName,ssd.standardName,hf.humanName from majorchange mc LEFT JOIN configfilethirdkind sanji on mc.newThirdKindId=sanji.thirdKindId LEFT JOIN configfilesecondkind erji on sanji.secondKindId=erji.secondKindId LEFT JOIN configfilefirstkind yiji on erji.firstKindId=yiji.firstKindId LEFT JOIN humanfile hf on mc.humanId=hf.humanId LEFT JOIN salarystandard ssd on mc.newsalarystandardId=ssd.standardId where mc.checkStatus=0 GROUP BY mc.mchId DESC

select mc.mchId,mc.humanId,hf.humanName,yiji.firstKindId,erji.secondKindId,mc.newThirdKindId,cfk.majorKindId,mc.newMajorId,mc.newsalarystandardId, mc.newSalarySum,mc.changeReason from majorchange mc LEFT JOIN configfilethirdkind sanji on mc.newThirdKindId=sanji.thirdKindId LEFT JOIN configfilesecondkind erji on sanji.secondKindId=erji.secondKindId LEFT JOIN configfilefirstkind yiji on erji.firstKindId=yiji.firstKindId LEFT JOIN humanfile hf on mc.humanId=hf.humanId LEFT JOIN salarystandard ssd on mc.newsalarystandardId=ssd.standardId LEFT JOIN configmajor cf on mc.newMajorId=cf.majorId LEFT JOIN configmajorkind cfk on cf.majorKindId=cfk.majorKindId where mchId=#{mchId}

select dd.mchId,dd.humanId,hf.humanName,yyiji.firstKindName,yerji.secondKindName,ysanji.thirdKindName, yzwfl.majorKindName,yzwmc.majorName,yxcbz.standardName,dd.salarySum, yiji.firstKindName 'newfirstKindName',erji.secondKindName 'newsecondKindName',sanji.thirdKindName 'newthirdKindName', zwfl.majorKindName 'newmajorKindName',zwmc.majorName 'newmajorName', xcbz.standardName 'newstandardName',dd.newSalarySum,dd.changeReason, dd.register,dd.registTime,dd.checker,dd.checkTime from majorchange dd LEFT JOIN humanfile hf on dd.humanId=hf.humanId LEFT JOIN configfilethirdkind ysanji on dd.thirdKindId=ysanji.thirdKindId LEFT JOIN configfilesecondkind yerji on ysanji.secondKindId=yerji.secondKindId LEFT JOIN configfilefirstkind yyiji on yerji.firstKindId=yyiji.firstKindId LEFT JOIN configmajor yzwmc on dd.majorId=yzwmc.majorId LEFT JOIN configmajorkind yzwfl on yzwmc.majorKindId=yzwfl.majorKindId LEFT JOIN salarystandard yxcbz on dd.salarystandardId=yxcbz.standardId LEFT JOIN configfilethirdkind sanji on dd.newThirdKindId=sanji.thirdKindId LEFT JOIN configfilesecondkind erji on sanji.secondKindId=erji.secondKindId LEFT JOIN configfilefirstkind yiji on erji.firstKindId=yiji.firstKindId LEFT JOIN configmajor zwmc on dd.newMajorId=zwmc.majorId LEFT JOIN configmajorkind zwfl on zwmc.majorKindId=zwfl.majorKindId LEFT JOIN salarystandard xcbz on xcbz.standardId=dd.newsalarystandardId where dd.mchId=#{mchid}
